medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain to the RUQ, fever, and chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks ago with diffuse abdominal pain. The patient also reports fever and chills at home without nausea, vomiting, or diarrhea. The patient has decreased oral intake secondary to pain, but normal bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholelithiasis/cystitis, cholangitis/sepsis, hypertension, diabetes mellitus type 2, pernicious anemia, abnormal mammogram, distal pancreatectomy/splenectomy/open cholecystectomy.
